DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.Id, T1.GroupingId, T4.value TenorBased, T5.value DayCounter, T6.value Compounding, T7.value CompoundingFrequency, T8.value TenorCalendar, T1.SpotLag, T10.value SpotCalendar, T11.value RollConvention, T12.value EOM FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsZero T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T4 ON T1.TenorBased = T4.value INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T5 ON T1.DayCounter = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCompounding T6 ON T1.Compounding = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesFrequencyType T7 ON T1.CompoundingFrequency = T7.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T8 ON T1.TenorCalendar = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T10 ON T1.SpotCalendar = T10.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention T11 ON T1.RollConvention = T11.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T12 ON T1.EOM = T12.value

field.name: *TenorBased
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value TenorBased, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: *DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Compounding
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Compounding,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCompounding !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: CompoundingFrequency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value CompoundingFrequency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesFrequencyType !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: TenorCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value TenorCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: SpotCalendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value SpotCalendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: RollConvention
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value RollConvention,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBusinessDayConvention !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: EOM
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value EOM, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value
